climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Soft & Comfortable Surface】：The fabric almost feel like terrycloth and velvety feeling, pets and children will love moving around on the carpet. Soft rugs are perfect plush addition to your favorite space

【Non-Slip & Safe】：The runners for hallways with rubber backing are coated with a TPR backing to help the non slip runner rug stay in place. （No need to pay for extra rug pad.） Sufficient grip to prevent dangerous slips. Safe to use on laminate and hardwood floors

【Machine Washable Rugs】：Lahome washable runner rugs are created to make maintenance a breeze. Not easy to change its shape after washing. Use a handheld small vacuum cleaner to remove the dust or hair for daily care. Machine wash with cold water on gentle cycle. Not easy to change its shape after washing. Do Not Use Chlorine Or Bleach
【Premium Recycled Fiber】: Made of renewable polyester, lightweight yet durable enough to standing high traffic. Friendly manufacturing process and recycled fabric

【Foldable Rug Runners 2x6】：Foldable entryway runner rug make it easier to taking it in or out. The creases and resistance to laying perfectly flat are only temporary. ✨Tips: Roll the rug in the opposite direction and lay it flat for a while. Creases typically flatten out within 1-2 weeks of unrolling

【Note】: Please allow 1-2 cm error due to manual measurement and the picture may not reflect the actual color as different monitor display and light effect. In order to make the rugs more durable, the pattern is printed on the fleece
body.description: Area rugs help bring color, warmth and definition to any part of your home, from the front door to the bedroom. They're a great way to show your personal style and suit the fussiest of feet. Whether you are looking for a quality rug for years to come or just an impromptu design change in your home decor, Lahome rugs are the perfect choice.Features:-This popular rug from Lahome comes in a great assortment of colors and designs to suit the most discerning decorating needs. - Soft and dense with a subtle beautiful pattern, these rugs are made for maximum comfort, which provides a nice soft feel to your feet. - Available array of various sizes, colors and patterns make decorating floors easy, entertaining, and enjoyable.It can be used in the living room, bedroom, children's room, etc. - Rugs bring comfort and atmosphere, large ones define the seating area in the living room, runners soften your steps in the hallway and door mats welcome you home. - Clean with a water based detergent and a soft brush, vacuum regularly, placing the beater bar and brush at the highest setting as to avoid excess wear. Accent your home and add a soft touch to your house with Lahome rugs. Buy it now.Note1.The digital images on our website are as accurate as possible. Due to differences in computer monitors, some rug colors may vary slightly. 2.Lengths and widths may vary from the published dimensions. We do our best to provide you with an exact measurement, but please be advised that some variation exists.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for someone who has pets with muddy paws
reviews.reviewText: The fact that this is washable makes this great. We have this in by our door where the dogs come in with muddy paws. They always track all over our kitchen but I don't notice it as much since this rug is gone down and the rug doesn't even look dirty yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these rugs to help my dogs from slipping on my hardwood floors. They stay in place and look good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent runner rug

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super soft texture and color size exactly as shown when purchasing. No issues at all and have had this in my laundry room for 2 months now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s even nicer than expected… I put it in my laundry room to cover some tiles that don’t look so good and it fits perfect… it’s also nice to stand on when doing laundry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, But the Folds are Hard to Get Rid Of
reviews.reviewText: This rug feels very much like a blanket, and came folded like one. The softness is nice, but my only issue with this is that three days have passed and the folds still haven't completely come out. I'm hoping that it will flatten out soon.I love the fact that this rug doesn't slide around on my hardwood floors. The backing is clearly of superior quality, and does not require any type of padding or mounting.I purchased a color that should do a good job of concealing dirt. I placed the rug in a high-traffic area just in front of the sliding glass door that leads to my patio. There's an indoor/outdoor rug right on the other side, so between the two of them my floors should stay clean the way I like them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Plush, and Safe
reviews.reviewText: I received the orange ombre and I couldn't be more in love! I have this in my entryway, a high-traffic area, as a segue from my tonal beige decor into my main living area which is beige, burnt orange, black, and ivory. I have always struggled to find just the right rug and this one is perfect in every way.The fabric feels luxurious, almost like terrycloth and velvet, creating a cozy atmosphere that my dog is obsessed with. He is a non-shedding dog, but the quality material doesn't feel like something hair would cling to. I can confidently place it on my tiled floors without worrying about dangerous slips. The safety aspect coupled with its softness makes it an ideal choice for hallways and high-traffic areas.Maintenance is a breeze with this machine-washable rug. It retains its shape even after washing, and daily care is as simple as using a small handheld vacuum cleaner to remove dust. The ease of cleaning adds to its practicality.This runner rug combines luxurious comfort, safety, and eco-friendliness. It not only enhances the aesthetics of my space but also provides a practical solution for high-traffic areas. I highly recommend this runner for anyone seeking a soft, non-slip, and easy-to-maintain addition to their home. Love, love, love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just redecorated my apartment in blue, white and gray. My runner arrived today that will go in my kitchen. I absolutely love this rug. It is soft, does not slid around, and is thin enough that you do it trip on it.i also love the price! I hope I can find a larger version of this one. I need a 5x7 or 8x10. I see pictures of larger rugs but I can’t find them. Help!
